activities: Pilgrim Quality is a software development company that offers quality management software as a service (SaaS) for Life Sciences Corporations.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, United Kingdom
personaldata: Pilgrim Quality provides quality management software through a SaaS model.  Pilgrim Quality does not have knowledge of, nor control over the electronic data that is uploaded by its customers to the quality management software.
privacyprograms: Pilgrim Quality has an internal privacy program that follows the Safe Harbor Framework.  Pilgrim Quality participates in the American Arbitration Association dispute resolution process.
recoursemech: Pilgrim Quality will cooperate with European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union.
